    I am a 2nd year PhD student at the University of Edinburgh (start from Sept. 2023), a member of EdinburghNLP, supervised by Pasquale Minervini and Mirella Lapata. My research interests lie in foundation model pre-training and scalable mechanism interpretability. I am currently working to ‚Äúopen the black box‚Äù to enable more efficient LLMs pre-training and inference.
